columns: NVL(rd_challenge.cnt_rechal,0) as cnt_rechal, NVL(rd_challenge.cnt_dechal,0) as cnt_dechal

NVL(sev_table1.FLG_SERIOUS,0) as new_serious , NVL(sev_table1.FLAG_SERIOUS_DEATH,0) as new_serious_death , NVL(sev_table1.FLAG_SERIOUS_THREAT,0) as new_serious_threat , NVL(sev_table1.FLAG_SERIOUS_OTHER_MED_IMP,0) as new_serious_med_imp , NVL(sev_table1.FLAG_SERIOUS_INT_REQ,0) as new_serious_int_req , NVL(sev_table1.FLAG_SERIOUS_HOSP,0) as new_serious_hosp , NVL(sev_table1.FLAG_SERIOUS_PRLNG_HSPTALIZED,0) as new_serious_prlg_host , NVL(sev_table1.FLAG_SERIOUS_DISABLE,0) as new_serious_disbale , NVL(sev_table1.FLAG_SERIOUS_CONG_ANOM,0) as new_serious_cong_anom

NVL(sev_table2.FLG_SERIOUS,0) as percent_serious , NVL(sev_table2.FLAG_SERIOUS_DEATH,0) as percent_serious_death , NVL(sev_table2.FLAG_SERIOUS_THREAT,0) as percent_serious_threat , NVL(sev_table2.FLAG_SERIOUS_OTHER_MED_IMP,0) as percent_serious_med_imp , NVL(sev_table2.FLAG_SERIOUS_INT_REQ,0) as percent_serious_int_req , NVL(sev_table2.FLAG_SERIOUS_HOSP,0) as percent_serious_hosp , NVL(sev_table2.FLAG_SERIOUS_PRLNG_HSPTALIZED,0) as percent_serious_prlg_host , NVL(sev_table2.FLAG_SERIOUS_DISABLE,0) as percent_serious_disbale , NVL(sev_table2.FLAG_SERIOUS_CONG_ANOM,0) as percent_serious_cong_anom
